data.text:
ACU Secures World Series Spot with Unforgettable Walk-Off Victory!

Barna Research Identifies Shifts in U.S. Evangelicalism

LEARN WHY ARIZONA CHRISTIAN UNIVERSITY IS DIFFERENT

A Message from President Len Munsil

Now Accepting Applications

MA – Education

MSMFT – Marriage and Family Therapy

MA – Christian Leadership

Raising Spiritual Champions:

Nurturing Your Child's Heart, Mind and Soul

A UNIVERSITY UNLIKE

ANY OTHER

Arizona Christian University is an award-winning, culturally and theologically conservative university where students and their professors are serious about deepening their Christian faith and where relationships and community matter most. If you seek a university that is courageously Christian, then Arizona Christian University is the place for you.

Best Regional Colleges

In The West

Seven Years In A Row

US News & World Report, 2017-2023

#1 University

In Arizona

College Consensus, 2018 and 2019

Top 50

Bible Schools

Christian Universities Online, 2017

NEWS

CRC: Evangelical Influence Declining

US Undergoing ‘Generational’ Shift

Get George Barna’s Book: Raising Spiritual Champions

ACU Spotlight

“I chose ACU because I loved how the students and faculty felt like a family. The relationships that everyone had with each other and the faculty and staff were an awesome community that I wanted to be a part of.”

Emily Hobrock

Sophomore

At ACU I studied and became friends with students from throughout the United States and from around the world. I will take the spiritual knowledge, education and relationships with faculty and students into everything I do for God’s Kingdom.

Darius Gasatura

alumnus, seminary student

The ACU Music Department has allowed me the freedom to express, grow, and challenge myself in worship. I chose this program over others because of its intimate environment that is entirely fixed on Jesus, and the people involved in it. Our program is the perfect size for you to gain experience in your craft and build deep relationships with faculty. With leaders who are seeking to train musicians who are passionate about the Gospel, and sensitive to the Spirit, one cannot help but to grow.

Bailey Goalstone

music student

small is

good

You won’t be lost in a crowd at Arizona Christian University. Students develop long-lasting relationships through community building experiences such as small group Bible studies, academic study groups, on-campus worship, athletic events and more.
